Latest News
-----------

[view all news](https://www.sweenytx.gov/newslist.php)

[### Office Closure](https://www.sweenytx.gov/#)
01-23-2026

City offices will be closed on Monday, January 26th, 2026 due to inclement weather. Essential personnel will remain active and on-duty.

The City will continue to monitor conditions and communicate updates as needed.

For any city related issues, to include water and/or gas leaks, please contact Public Works at 979 429 6171.

  
![freezing weather update (1) - Copy](https://www.sweenytx.gov/newsimages/freezing%20weather%20update%20(1)%20-%20Copy.jpg?t=202601231534060)

[### Official Statement](https://www.sweenytx.gov/#)
01-23-2026

Due to recent developments involving the Sweeny Fire Department, the attached statement has been issued by Mayor Hopkins on behalf of the City of Sweeny.  
[OFFICIAL STATEMENT](https://www.sweenytx.gov/newsimages/Official%20Statement%2001232026.pdf?t=202601231645270)  
![Screenshot (63) - Copy](https://www.sweenytx.gov/Document_Center/Newslist/Screenshot%20(63)%20-%20Copy.jpg?t=202601231512560)

[### Severe Winter Weather Approaching this Weekend](https://www.sweenytx.gov/#)
01-21-2026

See [SUBPAGE](https://www.sweenytx.gov/newsimages/Official%20Statement%2001232026.pdf?t=202601231645270) for further information.   
  
![Screenshot (60) - Copy](https://www.sweenytx.gov/newsimages/Screenshot%20(60)%20-%20Copy.jpg?t=202601211307310)

City Hall Information
---------------------

102 W. Ashley Wilson Rd  
P.O. Box 248   
Sweeny, TX 77480   
Phone: (979) 548-3321  
After Hours Public Works On Call Personnel- (979) 429-6171  
Email: [info@sweenytx.gov](https://sweenytx.gov/contact-us/)[Get Directions](https://goo.gl/maps/Z4qrsxwC8f82)  
  
Hours of Operation   
Monday- Friday 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM

For emergencies, please call 911 or Dispatch at 979 548 3111.  For after hours City related issues or to report a gas leak, call our Public Works on call personnel at 979 429 6171.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------

* [Police Department (979) 548-3112](https://www.sweenytx.gov/city_departments/police_department.php)
* [Fire Department (979) 548-3320](https://www.sweenytx.gov/city_departments/fire_rescue.php)
